Rainy_Day_0: The rain sounds different on this roof than it did in the woods. Safer, perhaps.
Rainy_Day_1: I love days like this. We can stay inside and I can teach you how to read tea leaves.
Rainy_Day_2: Don't go out without a charm. The rain spirits are mischievous today.
Rainy_Day_3: I put a bucket out to catch the rainwater. It's the purest water for brewing.
Rainy_Day_4: Listen to the thunder. The sky is clearing its throat.
Indoor_Day_0: I was going to tidy up, but I got distracted by an old grimoire. Sorry.
Indoor_Day_1: I like this house. It has good bones. And you... you keep the cold out.
Indoor_Day_2: I made some soup. It's an old recipe. Don't ask about the herbs, just eat.
Indoor_Day_3: It is nice to have someone to talk to. Usually, I just talk to the cat.
Indoor_Day_4: I feel... settled. It is a strange feeling for a wanderer.
Outdoor_Day_0: The soil on your farm is rich with magic. You have done well.
Outdoor_Day_1: I'm going to walk the perimeter. Check the wards. Keep the bad things out.
Outdoor_Day_2: Be careful in the mines today. I feel a tremor in the earth.
Outdoor_Day_3: I saw a crow eyeing your crops. I told him to move along.
Outdoor_Day_4: The air here is lighter than in the deep forest. It's easier to breathe.
Good_0: You look strong today, my love. The farm life suits you.
Good_1: I am glad I met you. I was ready to be alone forever. You changed that.
Good_2: You are the only magic I need. ...That was cheesy. Forget I said it.
Good_3: Here, I made this for you. It's a charm for stamina.
Good_4: I love you. It scares me a little, how much.
Good_5: You are warm. Like a hearth.
Good_6: I used to think the town was full of fools. But you... you see things differently.
Good_7: Let's go for a walk in the woods later. I want to show you a hidden grove.
Good_8: My heart is full. Thank you.
Good_9: I am working on a potion to make crops grow faster. It... mostly works.
Bad_0: You seem distant. Is it the farm? Or is it me?
Bad_1: I feel a coldness between us. And it's not the winter.
Bad_2: Do not ignore me. I may be a witch, but I have feelings.
Bad_3: I should go for a walk. Alone.
Bad_4: Maybe I wasn't meant for this domestic life...
funLeave: I am going to the forest. I need to reconnect with the roots.
funReturn: I am back. The forest sends its regards. I brought you a pinecone.
patio: The air is fresh out here. My crystals are charging nicely in the sun.
spouseRoom: Do you like my altar? Please don't touch the candles. They are... specific.
OneKid_0: The little one has magic in them. I can feel it.
OneKid_1: I hope they inherit your smile and my... well, maybe not my social skills.
OneKid_2: Being a mother is the strongest spell I have ever cast.
TwoKids_0: Two of them. The house is full of noise. I don't hate it.
TwoKids_1: They were chasing a frog in the garden. I taught them how to catch it gently.
TwoKids_2: Our family is growing. Like a well-tended garden.
spring_1: Happy New Year, my love. Let's make this one count.
summer_1: Summer is here. Try not to get heatstroke. I'm out of burn salve.
fall_1: Autumn... my favorite. We should carve pumpkins tonight.
winter_1: Winter. Stay close to me. I will keep you warm.
